players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I know Charlie is mafia. Let's work together to find him out."
You: "I'm still trying to figure things out. Let's gather more information before making any accusations."
Charlie: "I'm just a simple man who wants to live in peace. I don't know what's going on, and I think we should all work together to figure it out."
Diana: "I will continue to investigate and gather evidence. Let's keep an open mind but remain vigilant. We need to work together to uncover the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
